title: ICE: compilation of `clang-ast v0.1.13` failed the assertion

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
### Details: ``` The compiler failed the assertion when it was building the crate clang-ast v0.1.13 These are the compiler flags: --crate-type lib -C opt-level=3 -C embed-bitcode=no ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.66.1 (90743e729 2023-01-10) (Rev1, Built by MSYS2 project) binary: rustc commit-hash: 90743e7298aca107ddaa0c202a4d3604e29bfeb6 commit-date: 2023-01-10 host: x86_64-pc-windows-gnu release: 1.66.1 LLVM version: 15.0.5 Msys2.exe name: msys2-x86_64-20221216.exe ``` ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: pos.get() <= self.position()', compiler\rustc_metadata\src\rmeta\encoder.rs:426:9 ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'assertion failed: pos.get() <= self.position()', compiler\rustc_metadata\src\rmeta\encoder.rs:426:9 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7ffe57f7d616 - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::trace_unsynchronized::ha5de96ba347eafd0 1: 0x7ffe57fb0cd2 -
